title: Part-Time SEO/Website Onboarding Assistant - $400 US/month
job_overview:
We’re looking for someone with strong local SEO experience, a solid understanding of DNS and getting websites live, and excellent English communication skills to help manage the early stage of client onboarding.

--TO APPLY--
1. Please take this screening quiz first: Upgrade to see actual info

2. Then send us an email with a video/audio recording of WHY you'd be a good fit along with your resume.

--What This Role Offers--

$400/month USD (paid reliably every month - even if workload is light)

Part-time for now (typically 10–20 hrs/week, sometimes less)

Great opportunity to grow into a long-term, full-time role

Work from anywhere - just be available during 9 AM – 5 PM CST

No micromanagement - just stay organized and get things done

--Your Core Responsibilities--

Once a client signs on, you take over onboarding

Assist clients in getting their new website live - quickly and confidently

Most clients use GoDaddy, Namecheap, or Dreamhost (Sometimes they give you login access; other times you’ll guide them)

You should be comfortable managing A Records, nameservers, etc.

Coordinate with our web designer to fix or adjust anything needed

Help collect Google Business Profile (GBP) access and assist with setup

Keep all progress organized in ClickUp

Once the site is live and GBP is ready, pass the client to our CSM

--Who This Is For--

You have hands-on local SEO experience (especially with service businesses)

You understand how to structure service pages and local landing pages

You know how to get websites live fast - without needing to be handheld

You’re organized, proactive, and naturally follow up until things are done

You speak and write fluent English - and you’re comfortable messaging or calling clients when needed

You’re happy working behind the scenes - but not afraid to step up when needed

This is a low-stress, high-impact role - and the perfect opportunity for someone who wants consistent income, meaningful work, and the potential to grow with a tight-knit team.

--TO APPLY--
1. Please take this screening quiz first: Upgrade to see actual info

2. Then send us an email with a video/audio recording of WHY you'd be a good fit along with your resume.
